The web page editor lets you visually edit the content of your page, in a manner similar to a word processor. This format was developed for users who found the EClass Page format too restricting or who wanted soemthing that worked more like software they were familiar with. Some of the supported operations are:
  • Bold, Italic, Underline
  • Font style, size and color change
    • Indent...
  • ... and outdent
  • Bullets and numbering
  • Insert hyperlinks and images
  • Simple table support
  • Cut, Copy and Paste
  • Undo, redo support.
